resources.string:
The Serval Auto Shutdown application will automatically shutdown a device, if after a period of time the the screen is not unlocked. 

This application requires the ability to use root privileges in order to shutdown the device. When enabled for the first time a check for root access will be performed. 

The alert tone, the time delay before shutdown, and other settins can be changed by touching the settings button below. 

To enable the application touch the enable button below.
A check to see if this application can run as root will now be performed, if prompted allow the application to run as root.
The permission to run as root was denied. Ensure this device is rooted and has the su library installed before trying again.
Serval Auto Shutdown is now enabled
